attributes.action: Stop the possible closure of Fazakerley Special Needs Centre, Liverpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A news report for the North West stated that the City Council are seriously considering the closure of a Special Needs Centre for children in Fazakerley Liverpool.  The children love going to the centre and help for special needs children is very hard to come by.  It also gives help for the parents.  It would be devastating to parents and children if this centre was to close.
